Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: "On the day of Support Force recruit graduation, Babylonia's weather simulation system creates a brilliantly sunny day."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Bridget... Over here!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Impressed by this year's recruits, Support Force Captain approves limited funds for a modest graduation ceremony."}
{3: "Despite Trojan's protests and obvious reluctance, the graduation ceremony goes ahead in full swing."}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Bridget! Look! My evaluation report!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'With this... I can finally apply for a transfer to Task Force!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "That's wonderful! See! I told you you could do it!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "All thanks to you... I'd probably still be the dead weight of the class without you...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Thank you, Bridget!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Don't mention it, That's what friends are for!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Bridget laughs and gives Ruolin's shoulder a friendly pat."}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'But I still want to thank you in my own way...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ruolin carefully pulls three colorful cards from her pocket with excitement.'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'I managed to get three movie tickets from the WGAA. Would you like to watch it with me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hm? Where's Jeffrey?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "He's away on a mission on the surface, b-but... I'm not just asking you because he couldn't make it! You're not my backup plan or anything!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Look, to prevent resale, the tickets all have our names—Bridget, Ruolin, and T...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Um, y-yes... Instructor Trojan has helped me a lot, so I wanted to invite her, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I-I'm a bit scared to ask her...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hey, what's there to be scared of? Come on, I'll go with you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I haven't seen Instructor Trojan since earlier...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Uh-huh, she's hiding somewhere, but I know exactly where. Let's go!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory457.jpg'}
{3: 'Leaving the noisy ceremony behind, Bridget guides Ruolin through shortcuts past the training grounds and supply areas to the Support Force warehouse.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'I had no idea there was a shortcut...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Yeah, I like to explore if there is downtime between my training sessions.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "So that's how I know...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She lifts a curtain and sees Trojan standing inside with her arms crossed.'}
{3: 'Trojan instinctively moves her hand onto her weapon.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "I knew you'd be here!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'A harsh light breaks into the room.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ruolin managed to get three movie tickets. Care to join us, Instructor Trojan?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: '...Not interested.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trojan casts a tired glance at Bridget and the timid Ruolin, feeling mentally drained.'}
{3: 'When will they leave? The Kurono informant will be here any minute.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "These tickets are really hard to get. They're non-transferable, and Ruolin went through a lot to get them...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "...I'm really not interested.", 4: '1'}
{3: "This is true—she's never been interested in the Golden Age... maybe only a little."}
{3: 'The only thing she cares about is hoarding actual gold.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Movies are just... actors acting out the lives and desires of others.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "When a character in a movie finds treasure, it doesn't help you in any way in real life. When they suffer...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Humph. Isn't real-world suffering much worse than the staged dramas in movies?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Sigh... Is that really what you think of movies as a form of entertainment?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Is there an issue?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trojan ponders how to get the two of them to leave while she waits for Bridget to continue the argument.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hmm... I mean, it's subjective. I may not understand it, but I respect your perspective.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's go, Ruolin. When's our movie starting?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'It... it starts at 7:30 in the evening...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget quickly leaves with a tearful Ruolin, leaving Trojan momentarily lost.'}
{3: 'Still... I guess this is better.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory457.jpg'}
{3: 'The Kurono agent arrives exactly five minutes later using secret signals before entering this corner of the warehouse that has no surveillance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Informant', 3: '7:30 tonight, at the new outdoor theater of the WGAA.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Informant', 3: 'You\'ll receive your next mission info there. The keyword is "popcorn"... Why are you holding out your hand?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "I'm not going to pay money to get info for my new mission. Since when do employees have to pay to work?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Informant', 3: "...I can't make that call. I suggest you inquire with Logistics Support, or file for reimbursement afterward.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'You better hope that works.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Informant', 3: "...I've got other stuff to do. See ya.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The informant leaves in a rush for fear that Trojan might grab a chair and smash it over his head.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Too scared of Babylonia to set up more encrypted channels, forcing these stupid rendezvous... And now I'm even supposed to ******* pay for this myself? Urgh...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: '****... Dammit! I want to bloody quit...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Oh, it's already ******* five-thirty. Where am I supposed to get those cursed movie tickets... Wait.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory457.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's go, Ruolin. When's our movie starting?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'It... it starts at 7:30 in the evening...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory457.jpg'}
{3: 'Trojan pauses for a moment before making a call.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: '...Ahem, Bridget? Is Ruolin... is Ruolin still with you?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg'}
{3: 'Night falls and a few stars begin to glide across the simulated sky.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The WGAA spent a fortune restoring projection equipment from the Golden Age and built a new outdoor theater to regularly screen classic films shot on Earth during that era.'}
{3: 'The chairman of the WGAA claims that the films help those who have lived in Babylonia for too long remember their homeland—a place so close yet so far.'}
{3: 'This excuse is a bit far-fetched, but Babylonia approved it.'}
{3: 'At the modest outdoor venue, fighters and staff from Babylonia fill the seats in high spirits. Some have brought homemade snacks and various electrolyte drinks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's see... This is us! Oh, Trojan? You're so early.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'They are surprised to find the blue-haired Construct already sitting there with her eyes closed. Several gold bottles lie by her feet.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Mmm... ah, you're here.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'They did do her a favor, so Trojan forces a polite smile.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "I wasn't going to come because I don't really care for this kind of entertainment, as you know, but... Ahem.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'The drinks I ordered just arrived, and they expire in three days, so I brought them here... or they would go to waste.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Here, these are for you.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She points at the neatly placed drinks.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hey, I thought Constructs don't need to eat...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "No way! It's the limited edition beer-like alcohol-flavor electrolyte!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'The... what?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "Constructs don't need to eat, but we can drink electrolytes like these... This is amazing! Jeffrey and I have been dying to try this, but we could never get our hands on it...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Wait... I thought alcohol-flavor electrolytes have a shelf life of 30 days...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Bridget gently tugs at Ruolin's shirt."}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Ah... Oh! A-anyway, thank you. Thank you so much!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "Don't worry about it... I'm glad you like it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns her gaze away uncomfortably. She is not used to handling such direct displays of emotion.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Is the movie about to start?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The guide lights dim as the massive screen, raised by the WGAA staff, flickers with snow-like static.'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'This one should be called "The Twilight Seeker". I heard it\'s a really old film...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'This is my first time watching a movie...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The movie begins.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory923.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{3: 'On an endless wilderness, golden sands, and gun smoke linger in the air. The sun is dipping low.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'Horses and convertibles race across the vast landscape. Cloaks billow wildly in the dusty wind as thundering hoofbeats rip through the air.'}
{3: 'The film rolls slowly, but Bridget and Ruolin are already lost in this symphony of light and shadow. Even Trojan finds herself drawn into this world on a screen...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Click.'}
{3: 'As the sound of mechanical gears breaks the silence, the massive screen suddenly goes dark.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "What—! What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I think there's something wrong with the projector...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: 'The projector has short-circuited. Screening will resume in approximately three minutes. Please remain in your seats—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: 'I repeat: The projector has short-circuited. Screening will resume in about three minutes. Please remain in your seats—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oh, thank goodness! It'll resume. I thought it was going to just stop right at the cliffhanger...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Trojan? Where are you going? The movie will resume in three minutes!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "I'll go and get some... popcorn.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trojan is walking in the darkness with a bucket of popcorn. Its ridiculous sweet aroma rises with an irritating intensity that disrupts her rare moment of peace.'}
{3: 'Hidden among the popcorn is a note with several timestamps written in code.'}
{3: 'Konstantin. Support. Eliminate.'}
{3: 'A surge of emotion wells up in her. She cannot tell whether it is satisfaction or sorrow. She crumbles the note in the darkness and returns to her seat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Popcorn... Can Constructs even eat that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "...It's fine. Eating occasionally can stabilize a Construct's M.I.N.D. Didn't you learn this in cultural training?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ah... Haha... Mind if I try some?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget giggles playfully as she shares the bucket of popcorn with Ruolin.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Here, try some...', 4: '1'}
{3: "She grabs a handful of popcorn and puts it in Trojan's palm."}
{3: 'At the end of the movie, everyone meets their destiny—the villain who had all the cards falls victim to their own greed, and the vengeful hero rides off into a new life.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'Phew... I was so worried the villain would get a happy ending...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hah, if I were the protagonist, I wouldn't have gotten myself into that situation... Trojan? The movie's over.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'From that ending, right? It was amazing!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: '...Yeah, it was.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'The despicable and greedy will get what they deserve.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'This... this is how any story should end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Right? Eh... wait, Trojan? You're going the wrong way! The dorm is this way!", 4: '2'}
